div.p: Habari ActiveMQ Client is a library for Delphi(tm) and Free Pascal. With Habari, applications can connect to Apache ActiveMQ servers, subscribe to queues and topics, send and receive messages and objects, and work with transactions.

Habari ActiveMQ Client 1.0 has been released on March 5, 2008. Demo applications, API documentation and source code examples are available for download.
The API documentation is available at http://www.mikejustin.com/habari/docs/html/index.html
